permafrost.tundra.io.filter

Class ConditionalFilenameFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.io.filter.ConditionalFilenameFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.FilenameFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndFilenameFilter, OrFilenameFilter

    public abstract class ConditionalFilenameFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.FilenameFilter
    An abstract FilenameFilter that chains together other filters.
